sig_info: At the start of the fight each Champion on Hela’s team that is knocked out grants her +10 to 25.05 Spirits.
The first time Hela would be knocked out in each fight, she gains an Indestructible Buff that lasts for 3 to 5.01 seconds.

SPIRITS OF THE DEAD - PASSIVE: Hela controls the Spirits of the Dead, using them to power her Fury Buffs, giving them infinite duration, as long as she has Spirits.
Each Fury Buff active on her drains her Spirits over time, but each strike of her summoned swords empowers them.
If her Spirits are exhausted her Fury Buffs begin to expire 1 at a time.
HEAVY ATTACKS: While charging her Heavy Attack, Hela continually gains Fury Buffs granting +43 Attack.
PASSIVE: After taking more than 8% of her Base Health in damage from a single strike, Hela gains a Buff granting +533.33 Physical Resistance, that lasts until she is struck by a Heavy Attack.
This attack does not stack, instead if triggered multiple times, its effect increases by +533.33.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to trigger a Fury Buff granting +43 Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: This attack places an Armor Break on the Opponent reducing their Armor by 685.71 for each Fury currently active, lasting for 10 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: This attack deals bonus Physical Damage up to 7% of the Target’s missing health, based on the number of Fury Buffs active on Hela. Max Damage at: 5
